data.message: Hi, I'm currently managing Shopping Page on Facebook and that is really a good stuff (thank you very much for that!). However, we're having a hard time uploading products specially when bulky. How is it possible to upload products in massive way?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Meng. If you believe a feature isn't working properly, you can report it to us using these steps: http://bit.ly/2r7Srfz. Thanks. -Jessica

Facebook, What is going on with business pages?? I can NOT upload or post anything there. No problems on personal wall or in groups. I'm NOT the only one having problems with Biz page. Does it have anything to do with the recent "updates"? I can not upload pics, nothing. Matter of face, everytime I go to my Page, it freezes and says "Recover Webpage".
Hi Chris. Please help our team track this issue by reporting it with these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2rf8TdL. Thanks. -William
